message: I have a great opportunity for you to purchase a valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $15,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $11,000, which is still a good profit for you.  Let me know if you're interested.
I understand that $15,000 is a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11,000. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? It's a fair price for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm really hoping to stay under $12,000.  Would you consider coming down to $12,500?  This would be a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go up to $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time at $13,000. It's the lowest I can go.
